---
title: "Sony Events"
---

## SDIE_ObjectAdded (`0xc201`)

Notify that a shot file is ready to transfer

---

## SDIE_ObjectRemoved (`0xc202`)

Notify that a shot file is deleted

---

## SDIE_DevicePropChanged (`0xc203`)

Notify that the DevicePropValue is changed

---

## SDIE_DateTimeSettingResult (`0xc205`)

Notify Date/Time Setting result

---

## SDIE_CapturedEvent (`0xc206`)

Notify a captured event

---

## SDIE_CWBCapturedResult (`0xc208`)

Notify the result of Custom WB capture

---

## SDIE_CameraSettingReadResult (`0xc209`)

Notify the result of camera-setting read

---

## SDIE_FTPSettingReadResult (`0xc20a`)

Notify the result of FTP-setting read

---

## SDIE_MediaFormatResult (`0xc20b`)

Notify the result of media format

---

## SDIE_ContentsTransferEvent (`0xc20d`)

Notify that the ContentTransferEvent

---

## SDIE_ZoomandFocusPositionEvent (`0xc20e`)

Notify the Zoom and Focus Position Event

---

## SDIE_DisplayListChangedEvent (`0xc20f`)

Notify an update of DisplayStringList

---

## SDIE_MediaProfileChanged (`0xc210`)

Notify that the media profile is changed

---

## SDIE_ControlJobListEvent (`0xc211`)

Notify the Control Job List Event

---

## SDIE_ControlUploadDataResultOld (`0xc213`)

Notify the result of ControlUpload (older version)

---

## SDIE_ControlUploadDataResult (`0xc214`)

Notify the result of ControlUpload

---

## SDIE_ZoomPositionResultOld (`0xc216`)

Notify the zoom position result (older version)

---

## SDIE_ZoomPositionResult (`0xc217`)

Notify the zoom position result

---

## SDIE_FocusPositionResult (`0xc218`)

Notify the focus position result

---

## SDIE_LensInformationChangedOld (`0xc219`)

Notify that the lens information is changed (older version)

---

## SDIE_FirmwareUpdateCheckResultOld (`0xc21a`)

Firmware update check result (older version)

---

## SDIE_LensInformationChanged (`0xc21b`)

Notify that the lens information is changed

---

## SDIE_FirmwareUpdateEventOld (`0xc21c`)

Firmware update event (older version)

---

## SDIE_FirmwareUpdateCheckResult (`0xc21d`)

Firmware update check result

---

## SDIE_FirmwareUpdateEvent (`0xc21e`)

Firmware update event

---

## SDIE_StreamStatusEvent (`0xc21f`)

Notify the stream status event

---

## SDIE_OperationResultsOld (`0xc220`)

Notify the operation results (older version)

---

## SDIE_OperationResults (`0xc222`)

Notify the operation results

---

## SDIE_AFStatus (`0xc223`)

Notify the AF status

---

## SDIE_MovieRecOperationResults (`0xc224`)

Notify the execution results of Movie Rec Operation

---

## SDIE_PresetInfoListChangedOld (`0xc225`)

Notify that the PresetInfo List is changed (older version)

---

## SDIE_PresetInfoListChanged (`0xc226`)

Notify that the PresetInfo List is changed

---

## SDIE_CautionDisplayEventOld (`0xc227`)

Notify the CautionDisplayEvent (older version)

---

## SDIE_CautionDisplayEvent (`0xc228`)

Notify the CautionDisplayEvent

---

## SDIE_ContentInfoListChangedOld (`0xc229`)

Notify that the ContentInfo List is changed (older version)

---

## SDIE_ContentInfoListChanged (`0xc234`)

Notify that the ContentInfo List is changed

---

## SDIE_ControlPTZFResultOld (`0xc235`)

Notify the ControlPTZF result (older version)

---

## SDIE_PresetPTZFEventOld (`0xc237`)

Notify the PresetPTZF Event (older version)

---

## SDIE_ControlPTZFResult (`0xc238`)

Notify the ControlPTZF result

---

## SDIE_PresetPTZFEvent (`0xc239`)

Notify the PresetPTZF Event

---

## SDIE_DeleteContentResult (`0xc240`)

Notify the DeleteContentResult

---
